author: PlayStation
description:
In Monster Hunter Wilds, make sure you line up your bomb tosses before throwing!

See the full PlayStation Underground episode on our YouTube channel, where we play alongside producer Ryozo Tsujimoto and director Yuya Tokuda.
title: Missed by -that- much 🤏 In Monster Hunter Wilds, make sure you line up your bombs before throwing!

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/playerunknowns-battlegrounds/

This year, the battlegrounds shine brighter than ever. Set sail on a grand adventure in PUBG's 8th anniversary celebration Erangel world update, where grand parties, festive decorations, and hidden treasures await.
Oh, and don't forget to throw the Golden Grenades at the Bobble Bot to see your name light up in the starting island!

🎊 Update 34.2 coming on March 20 (UTC)

#ps4 #ps4games #PUBG #BATTLEGROUNDS #PU8G
title: PUBG: Battlegrounds - 8th Anniversary Gameplay Trailer | PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/zenless-zone-zero/

Write a poem with your bones, and bury your tears with the past.
The past will eventually be forgotten, and the future marches toward destruction.
Above the decaying ruins, some seek redemption, some stand guard, some pursue, and some resist.

#ps5 #ps5games #zenleszonezero
title: Zenless Zone Zero - "Among the Forgotten Ruins" Version 1.6 Teaser Trailer | PS5 Games
